attributes.action: make all banks Reduce Interest Rate charges on Credit Cards like Visa and Mastercard.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A request by the British Public to ask the Prime Minister to make all banks Reduce Interest Rate charges on Credit cards like Visa and Mastercard accounts . This will then reduce Debts because all payments will lower the overall debts on card accounts and not just pay extortionate ineterset rates charged by banks on such cards.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
